alert.note: Alert for Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 2:06PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT BEAUREGARD...NORTHWESTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES IN SOUTHWESTERN LOUISIANA AND CENTRAL NEWTON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CST... At 206 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lunita, or near De Quincy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, De Ridder, Westlake, Vinton, Merryville, Singer, Moss Bluff, De Quincy, Ragley, Starks, Fields, Bon Weir, Lunita, Bivens, Toomey, Gillis, Edgerly, Oretta, and Carlyss. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 32. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
